channel.title: NPC Drops Not Working! [PI]
channel.description:
Hey, Basically the NPC's in my server don't drop anything. For one example green dragons I want them to drop dragon bones which ID is 536 now the code below is of my NPCDrops.TSM
[code=java]#Green Dragons 941:30 536:200 1161:1 9244:15 554:100 209:2 1355:1 1462:1 9244:15 1247:1 1608:2 450:2 9244:15 995:1000 1197:1 1213:1 1602:1 555:100 365:2 217:2 201:2 563:10 1243:1 1163:1 1365:1 1606:3 119:2 207:2 561:10 830:5 1069:1 1604:2 2366:1 1249:1[/code]
Please Help, Thanks, Mr Rushed

item.title: NPC Drops Not Working! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Puffscape Puffscape
item.description:
@Puffscape wrote:

When you Run your server check for un-usual Messages like:
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found
at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Unknown Source)
at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37)
at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.(NPCDrops.java:15)
at server.Server.(Server.java:70)
If it says that then I have no idea why then… I need help with this too.

Read full topic
